text: @realDonaldTrump Blaming Obama is another one of your COVID failures! FYI, Refilling the stockpiles was in the White House budget request after the Ebola virus in 2014. #GOP controlled both houses of Congress & refused the funding. There were zero #COVID19 tests before 2019! #IdiotInChief #Ebola
